philosophy: Clarity is the highest virtue. A diagram should prove, not persuade.
best_for: Formal proofs; coordinate geometry; linear algebra; discrete structures; definitions; axioms; Archive taxonomic illustration

philosophy: Mathematics lives. Our diagrams should breathe.
ornamentation: minimal natural textures where they aid understanding
